- SRC_UNI cần có checksum
	Ở board RZ/G2L SMARC: 
	Apply patch 0002 và 0003 trong extra
	build xong ko lấy file có *-pmic*
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rz-common/recipes-debian/buster/glibc/cross-localedef-native_debian.bb cần edit thêm 1 dòng:
			SRC_URI[localedef.sha256sum] = "b3dea4bcae2b5be8ce693733f529992447822bd9b40ba11e289fbab201374d79"
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rz-common/recipes-debian/buster/sources/glibc.inc thay toàn bộ file thành:
			# This is generated by debian-source.bbclass
			DPV = "2.28-10+deb10u4"
			DPV_EPOCH = ""
			REPACK_PV = "2.28"
			PV = "2.28"

			DEBIAN_SRC_URI = " \
				${DEBIAN_SECURITY_UPDATE_MIRROR}/main/g/glibc/glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.dsc;name=glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.dsc \
				${DEBIAN_SECURITY_UPDATE_MIRROR}/main/g/glibc/glibc_2.28.orig.tar.xz;name=glibc_2.28.orig.tar.xz \
				${DEBIAN_SECURITY_UPDATE_MIRROR}/main/g/glibc/glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.debian.tar.xz;name=glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.debian.tar.xz \
			"

			SRC_URI[glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.dsc.md5sum] = "b39dd7f7f54c6b7da3eefcd391470af2"
			SRC_URI[glibc_2.28.orig.tar.xz.md5sum] = "2d78d5b080fbe4fefa2e1ccef9c39dbc"
			SRC_URI[glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.debian.tar.xz.md5sum] = "8ebb6ee80ba6a5e39eacc31c95994ef0"

			SRC_URI[glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.dsc.sha256sum] = "55e4ebd9a55755c84d42709b23f9b269f46b6a76f5040a0e05cfd323ba67f8af"
			SRC_URI[glibc_2.28.orig.tar.xz.sha256sum] = "53d3c1c7bff0fb25d4c7874bf13435dc44a71fd7dd5ffc9bfdcb513cdfc36854"
			SRC_URI[glibc_2.28-10+deb10u4.debian.tar.xz.sha256sum] = "dc287870d4b8cb5d1d175fa9b95e3a97d6b68699680b443ae7b2a1b89f0fe8fc"

		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rz-common/recipes-multimedia/gstreamer/gstreamer1.0-plugins-good_1.16.3.bbappend đổi gitsm thành https, thêm các patch sau vào SRC_UNI_remove:
		update: bỏ luôn SRC_URI_remove và SRC_URI_append
			SRC_URI_remove = "\
				https://gstreamer.freedesktop.org/src/gst-plugins-good/gst-plugins-good-${PV}.tar.xz \
				file://0001-qmlgl-ensure-Qt-defines-GLsync-to-fix-compile-on-som.patch \
				file://0001-qt-include-ext-qt-gstqtgl.h-instead-of-gst-gl-gstglf.patch \
				file://CVE-2021-3497.patch \
				file://CVE-2021-3498.patch \
				file://CVE-2022-1920.patch \
				file://CVE-2022-1921.patch \
				file://CVE-2022-1922-1923-1924-1925.patch \
				file://CVE-2022-2122.patch \
			"
			SRC_URI_append = " \
				https://github.com/renesas-rcar/gst-plugins-good.git;branch=RCAR-GEN3e/1.16.3;name=base \
			"
	Ở board RZ/G2L SBC: 
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rz-common/recipes-bsp/u-boot/u-boot_2021.10.bb: đổi git thành https
			UBOOT_URL = "https://github.com/renesas-rz/renesas-u-boot-cip.git"
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rz-common/recipes-bsp/trusted-firmware-a/trusted-firmware-a.bb:
		SRC_URI = " \
			https://github.com/renesas-rz/rzg_trusted-firmware-a.git;branch=${BRANCH};protocol=https \
			https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbedtls.git;branch=${BRANCH_mbedtls};name=mbedtls;destsuffix=mbedtls \
		"
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rzg2l/recipes-bsp/firmware-pack/fiptool-native.bb:
			URL = "https://github.com/renesas-rz/rzg_trusted-firmware-a.git"
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rz-common/recipes-kernel/linux/linux-renesas_5.10.bb:
			KERNEL_URL = " \
				https://github.com/renesas-rz/rz_linux-cip.git"
		~~~/meta-renesas/meta-rzg2l/recipes-bsp/firmware-pack/fiptool-native.bb:
			URL = "https://github.com/renesas-rz/rzg_trusted-firmware-a.git"

		rzsbc diff:

- rz-smarc scarthgap:
	/home/long.trinh-tien/rz-community-bsp/meta-rz-bsp/recipes-kernel/linux/linux-cip_6.1.bb thêm:
	SRC_URI += " \
		file://0001-linux-cip6.1-arm64-arch_gicv3-Workaround-GIC-access-.patch \
	"
	
- RZ sbc khi cắm UART phải đổi TXD và RXD cho nhau so với trên hướng dẫn
	Tạo sd bootable:
		Balena etcher trên linux:  reboot máy để chạy balena etcher không lỗi
		./sd_flash.sh /dev/sdb core-image-qt*.tar.gz (chỉ xài tar.gz, wic không extract được)
	Trong bootloader.py thêm:
	import codecs
	codecs.register_error("strict", codecs.ignore_errors)
	wic to sd card:
		sudo dd if=core-image-sato-raspberrypi4-64.wic of=/dev/sdX bs=1M status=progress
		bmaptool copy --nobmap core-image.wic /dev/sdb
	wic.bz2 to sd card
		sudo bmaptool copy core-image-sato-raspberrypi4-64.wic.bz2 /dev/sdX
